description:
## The Desktop Watchmaker Widget - View WatchMaker watches on your Desktop

![Screenshot of The Desktop Watchmaker Widget](https://www.japplis.com/desktop-watchmaker/widget/images/desktop-watchmaker-widget-screenshot.png)

Display WatchMaker watch faces on your desktop. The watch face can remain always on top and be translucent.
        You can move the watch location and size.
        It has support for WatchMaker .watch files but cannot render protected watch faces.
      Shareware: the application closes after one minute.
summary: View WatchMaker watches on your Desktop
author: Japplis
